explanation: The loop used range(20), which iterates i = 0..19 and omits i = 20 (the 100 km water station). This off-by-one error causes wrong results for positions near 100 km. I changed the loop to range(21) to include the i=20 station. This fix is inspired by common off-by-one corrections in the retrieved diffs (e.g. changing range endpoints or using n+1).
fixed_code:
N=int(input())
list=[]
for i in range(21):
  list.append(abs(N-i*5))
In=list.index(min(list))
print(In*5)
